name: Current Concepts in Resuscitation
content: The Current Concepts in Resuscitation Annual Conference incorporates the current International Liaison Committee on Resuscitation (ILCOR) Education and Science Recommendations, The IHCA AHA Consensus Recommendations, and The Emergency Cardiovascular Care Update objectives; while blending in the objectives required for the unique environment and challenges of the resuscitation environments, with additional objectives incorporated to meet the highest level of clinical expectation under the current United States CMS guidelines. URLs: Booking: https://go.evvnt.com/579447-2?pid=4868, Website: https://go.evvnt.com/579447-3?pid=4868, Website: https://go.evvnt.com/579447-4?pid=4868, Website: https://go.evvnt.com/579447-5?pid=4868, Brochure: https://go.evvnt.com/579447-6?pid=4868\. Time: 7:00 am to 3:00 pm. Venue details: Tropicana Las Vegas, 3801 South Las Vegas Boulevard, Las Vegas, Nevada, 89109, United States.
